page.title: LEMS elements
page.p: This page summarizes all the element types currently supported by the proof-of-concept interpreter. The explanations are somewhat cursory so it is probably better to look at the examples to work out what is going on.

There is one block for each element type. All element names are in fixed width bold. Attribute names are in normal fixed width. Each block shows the attributes supported by an element and then the types of children allowed.
Models can be spread over multiple files. The root element in each file is Lems.

Elt.name: Include
Elt.Label: the name or relative path of a file to be included
Elt.Info: Files are included where the Include declaration occurs. The enclosing Lems block is stripped off and the rest of the content included as is.
